Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of Archangel Suriel:

Text.Language: Marenouwst m~Viwt nem Ps/ri: nem Pip~neuma e#y#u#: n~tentaio~ n~Couri/l: pimah f~toou n~ar,/aggeloc.
Let us worship the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit, and honor Suriel the fourth archangel.
